html.p: Build custom dashboards faster, leveraging pre-built dashboard panels packaged within apps.
Enables anyone to build their own custom dashboard, leveraging pre-built dashboard panels packaged within apps.
Panels allow app developers to create and package re-usable dashboard building blocks that enable end-users to leverage in adapting applications to meet their specific requirements and use cases.

ul.li: Improve developer efficiency to support more use cases, requirements, and target users without additional effort
Easily adapt applications to meet the specific needs of each customer and organization
Expand engagement across multiple groups and levels of users with a single application
Enable any user to create personalized dashboards with information relative to their specific use case
Improves user efficiency with enhanced content browsing, search, and discovery
New add content workflow for inline panels, pre-built panels, reports, and cloning content from other dashboards
Improved add inline content flow, including the ability to select viz type directly within the add function
Ability to search across all available content
Preview content before adding to the dashboard
Convert to Prebuilt Panel to maximize reusability
Convert panel to inline to further customize
